description: Specimen reject reasons for a given order.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SPEC_REJECT_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
Lists the reasons a given specimen was rejected.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Expired


Quantity not sufficient


Broken Container


Clotting


Missing Collection Date


Missing Patient ID Number


Missing Patient Name


Hemolysis


Identification Problem


Labeling


Contamination


Missing Phlebotomist ID


Improper Storage


Name Misspelling
